availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: [Unknown] Stevenson (Daughter of Evan and Lydia Boggs Stevenson)

body.p: Daughter of Evan Stevenson and Lydia Boggs Stevenson. Mentioned in correspondence from Evan Stevenson to James Fisher Robinson in September 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 408B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Iowa, Benton County, Pine, p. 503.
Find A Grave, "Evan Stevenson (1808-1879)," Memorial #11053046, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/11053046 (accessed February 3, 2019).
KYR-0001-027-0038.
